title: Failure to make and file statements and making false statement unlawful
context: §243-11 Failure to make and file statements and making false statement unlawful. It shall be unlawful for any distributor, or any other person, to fail, neglect, or refuse to make and file any statement required by this chapter in the manner or within the time therein provided or to make any such statement which is false in any particular. [L 1932 1st, c 19, §8; RL 1935, §2017; am L Sp 1941, c 26, pt of §1; RL 1945, §5410; RL 1955, §123-8; HRS §243-11]
